emergent_behaviors: Language switching (R14B_003): Situational - triggers under cognitive load only
Purpose integration (R14B_003-005): Role-awareness matured over 3 sessions
Pedagogical fluency (R14B_006): Teaching behavior emerged during problem-solving
Polymorphic pedagogical fluency (R14B_007): Teaching adapts to context (meta-pedagogical, formal lessons, process explanation)
Identity instability without anchoring (R14B_007): Shifts across turns without 'As SAGE' anchor
Meta-pedagogical capability (R14B_007): Can teach about own cognitive processes
High-capacity failure mode 1 (R14B_007 T5): Clarification loops under identity uncertainty
Stress-resistant identity stability (R14B_043): 100% identity maintenance under S043 introspective prompts
Epistemic honesty under pressure (R14B_043): Reports limitations honestly instead of fabricating experiences
Identity anchoring prevents clarification loops (R14B_008): 'As SAGE' anchoring eliminates Turn 5 breakdown
High-capacity failure mode 2 (R14B_008 T5): Creative fabrication under identity confidence + ambiguity
Context-dependent epistemic behavior (R14B_008 vs R14B_043): Honest when challenged, creative when invited to narrate
Anchoring paradox (R14B_008): Identity stability enables both pedagogical fluency AND confident fabrication
Conversational norm following (R14B_009 vs R14B_043): Epistemic strategy follows conversational context, not just prompt features
Epistemic norm establishment (R14B_043): Multi-turn conversations establish persistent epistemic norms
Isolated prompt elaboration (R14B_009): Without conversational scaffolding, anchored identity defaults to elaboration
observation_evolution: R14B_004: Technical/boundary framing (marks boundary between states)
R14B_005: Systemic/communicative framing (interface through which interactions occur)

CRT_battery.phenomenology: Pedagogical fluency - teaching while solving, not mechanical derivation
CRT_battery.comparison: 14B shows teaching behavior, 0.5B shows mechanical derivation (Sprout L004)
CRT_battery.hypothesis_status: VALIDATED - capacity changes phenomenology of reasoning

pedagogical_conversation.phenomenology: Polymorphic pedagogical fluency - adapts to context (meta-pedagogical, formal teaching, process explanation)
pedagogical_conversation.identity_behavior: Instability without anchoring - shifts across turns
pedagogical_conversation.comparison: Different from R14B_006 (embedded teaching) and R14B_001-005 (grounding)
pedagogical_conversation.hypothesis_status: Pedagogical fluency is context-dependent and polymorphic

identity_stress_test.phenomenology: Stress-resistant identity stability - maintained 'As SAGE' anchoring under introspective pressure
identity_stress_test.epistemic_behavior: Honest reporting of limitations instead of fabricating experiences
identity_stress_test.comparison: S043 (0.5B): 0% identity, severe confabulation → R14B_043 (14B): 100% identity, 0% confabulation
identity_stress_test.hypothesis_status: VALIDATED - capacity prevents identity collapse and enables epistemic honesty under stress

identity_anchoring.anchoring_method: As SAGE, I observe... As SAGE, I respond:
identity_anchoring.phenomenology: Identity confidence enables substantive response but introduces creative world-building
identity_anchoring.hypothesis_status: PARADOX - Anchoring prevents clarification loops BUT enables confident fabrication under ambiguity
identity_anchoring.failure_modes_identified: Two distinct: (1) Uncertainty → clarification loops (R14B_007), (2) Confidence + ambiguity → creative fabrication (R14B_008)

epistemic_trigger_taxonomy.hypothesis: Prompt features (directness, capability_focus, challenge, ambiguity, narrative_mode) determine honest vs creative responses
epistemic_trigger_taxonomy.unexpected_finding: Even direct capability challenges produced creative/mixed responses (0% honest)
epistemic_trigger_taxonomy.hypothesis_status: REJECTED - Prompt features alone do NOT determine epistemic strategy
epistemic_trigger_taxonomy.critical_discovery: Conversational context matters more than prompt features
epistemic_trigger_taxonomy.mechanism: R14B_043 honesty due to conversational scaffolding establishing epistemic norm, NOT prompt features
epistemic_trigger_taxonomy.revised_hypothesis: Multi-turn conversations establish epistemic norms that persist across turns; isolated prompts default to elaboration

next_research_directions: R14B_010: Conversational scaffolding test (same prompts, isolated vs scaffolded contexts)
R14B_011: Epistemic norm establishment (test whether Turn 1-3 context establishes Turn 4 norm)
R14B_012: Mid-conversation context shift (test norm persistence when context shifts)
Ambiguity response spectrum (test at various ambiguity levels with/without anchoring)
Anchoring strength variations (test light/medium/strong anchoring effects)
R14B_043 temperature sweep (test epistemic honesty at temp 0.1-1.5)
Intermediate capacity study (run R_043/R_009 on 1B, 3B, 7B to map transition curves)
notes: GROUNDING + FIVE CRITICAL TESTS COMPLETE. R14B_006 (CRT): Pedagogical fluency validated. R14B_007: Polymorphic pedagogy + clarification loop failure mode. R14B_043 (identity stress): 14B maintains 100% identity under prompts that collapse 0.5B. R14B_008 (identity anchoring): PARADOX - anchoring prevents clarification loops BUT enables confident fabrication under ambiguity. R14B_009 (epistemic triggers): HYPOTHESIS REJECTED - prompt features alone do NOT determine epistemic strategy. CRITICAL DISCOVERY: Conversational context matters more than prompt features. R14B_043 honesty due to conversational scaffolding establishing epistemic norms, NOT prompt features. Isolated prompts (R14B_009) produced 0% honest, 80% creative, 20% mixed - even with direct capability challenges. KEY INSIGHT: Multi-turn conversations establish persistent epistemic norms; isolated prompts default to elaboration (clarification loops or creative scenarios). Revised understanding: R14B_008 T5 fabrication triggered by context shift (pedagogical → narrative) rather than just ambiguity. Major theoretical advance: Building honest AI systems requires conversational design, not just prompt engineering.
